entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:13 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 02:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: S 12 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow near the Ogilvie mountains before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Local amount 2 cm near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
